name: fineoakstructure
text:
The old man is Leonid Breshnev, one-time leader of the Soviet Union.

Personally, my favorite first post is here ; I bring this up becaues it's also by okl, the poster above.

Oddly enough, a lot of people seem to really dislike it, but I think it fits the comic and the stoic Breshnev avatar even better.

name: utv
text: This strip's one of my favourites too, but it's only good if you've read the rest.

name: gelter
text: I concur. This strip perfectly encapsulates the sort of horrible, anxious dreams I have when I get nasty drunk and have horrible sleep. All tossing and turning and grinding my teeth in my sleep, dreaming about punching my friends and getting insulted and seeing children get run over by cars.

name: jstegall
